msbt.message: A big thing is happening soon! It's gonna be the first time it happens on .I wonder what kinda thing it is?<10_4 /> I'm all curious-y inside—and also real squishy—I'm so excited!
Tomorrow's the big day! The first big event on this island! Since your arrival, I mean.I think tomorrow's gonna go down in history. I'm so excited, I might reverse eat!
Next Saturday is the Fishing Tourney. That's real cool, right?!I love fishing. It's real relaxing and when you're done, ya got dinner!
Tomorrow's the Fishing Tourney! I hope I catch boatloads of fish!Did you get that joke? About boats and fish? I thought I'd try out some jokes, a huh huh huh. Pretty good?
This Saturday is the Bug-Off! Some of my best friends are bugs. They're good talkers and tell funny jokes!
Tomorrow's finally the Bug-Off. I wonder what kind of bugs I'll meet?Pretty cool kinds, I'd guess Bugs are USUALLY pretty cool.<10_4 /> Once you get to know them.
Tomorrow's the day the folks from Happy Home Academy come to visit!The bugs in the floor always get excited when the Happy Home Academy comes by!I wonder what score I'll get?
Did ya see the results for Happy Home Academy already?<10_4 /> Mine said, "SO MANY BUGS!" <10_4 />Which is cool.
The year's over before too long.The 31st is gonna be one big New Year's Eve Countdown party, so we can say bye-bye to !
Tomorrow's the last day of ! The new year is so close I can smell it! And it smells DELICIOUS!I'm gonna say bye to at the Countdown party in the plaza at night!
